front.title: Provisioning, Auto-Discovery, and Signaling in L2VPNs for IPv6 Remote PE

abstract.t: L2VPN Signaling specification defines the semantic structure of the endpoint identifiers required by each model. It discusses the distribution of these identifiers by the discovery process, especially when such discovery is based on the Border Gateway Protocol (BGP). This document updates the end point encoding for BGP-Based Auto-Discovery and specifies a format for NLRI encoding for IPv6 PE Address. This document also specifies a new type of attachment identifier to carry IPv6 address as AII in LDP FEC 0x81. This document updates RFC6074.
